constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of 2no. hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions. The installation of 2no. rooflights to front roofslope and 2no. windows to the side elevation.
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition C.2 ( c)  any window inserted on  the roof slope forming a side elevation of the dwellinghouse shall be -   (i) obscure - glazed, and (ii) non- opening unless the parts of the windows which can be opened more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed of Class C, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition B.2 ( c)  any window inserted on a  wall or roof slope forming a side elevation of the dwellinghouse shall be -   (i) obscure - glazed, and (ii) non- opening unless the parts of the windows which can be opened more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
